features: Rechargeable: Built-in rechargeable battery, no need change battery. Special soundless design for the right and left buttons, won’t disturb others.
Colorful Light: 7 different color changes randomly while in use, offering soothing lighting, creating cool and fancy atmosphere for work and play.
Energy Saving: The mouse will be in sleep mode in 8 mins of inactivity. And the LED light can be turned off by the bottom light switch.
Slim & Portable: About 4.4 x 2.2 x 0.79 inches, Perfect for travelling carry and it can be easily put into your laptop bag and ultra-space saving.
Widely Compatibility: Works with Windows 2000/XP/7/8/10/Vista, Mac with USB port or Type C port. Suitable for homes, offices, travel and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: G12 LED Wireless Mouse with USB Receiver and Type C Adapter
G12 LED Wireless Mouse USB C Charging

How to Use 1. Charge the mouse for about 2 hours before using it for the first time. 2. Take the dongle out, which is stored under the back of the mouse. 3. Insert the dongle into the USB port of your PC. 4. Turn on the mouse, the switch is at the bottom of the mouse. 5. Allow a few seconds for installing, no action needed, just wait. Then you can use it.

Note 1. If your computer is Type-C port, you need to insert the Type-C adapter into the computer first and then insert the USB receiver into the Type-C adapter. Turn on the power switch and the mouse will work. 2. The mouse cursor will move slowly or stop moving when the mouse is low battery. Please charge it on time. 3. The blue light beside the scroll wheel will be on while charging, and then goes off when the mouse is fully charged. 4. Please use computer's USB interface to charging the wireless mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mouse I ever purchased for a computer!
reviews.reviewText: DISLIKES: NONE!LIKES: Has an off and on button with 2 ON modes, the middle position is just the mouse, the other on position turns on a beautiful slow fading rainbow light show along the sides of the mouse as well as a small view port on top that changes colors as the sides fade into each color. It's nice to be able to turn off the color changing mode, as that does eat a bit more power to have that function on. I use that function when I feel like I need a change, then turn it off when I'm getting down to serious work. The mouse is wireless, came with everything needed to have it up and running once fully charged, this can take anywhere from 1 to 2 hours depending on how much use is put on the rechargeable battery within it. Comes with it's own charging cable, and yes, it can be used while charging, it may take a little longer to get to a full charge if in use while charging, but at least you CAN still use it while charging, although I'd recommend buying a longer USB cable if you need to use it while in charge mode. But it seems to hold up for a very long time before needing a recharge, again, this depends on how much usage it gets. You'll know when it's time to recharge it, as it will become erratic and slow to respond when the battery has gotten too weak to keep the pointer moving smoothly across your screen and button presses slow or not responding.It self-installs, and that only took less than a minute on my old antiquated desktop system I'm using for creating my Christmas and Halloween Animated Lights to Music displays, as well as games I play on it and other things I use the system for.The mouse is comfortable in the hand, the soft touch buttons and scroll wheel are fantastic, no annoying clicking of the buttons when pressed or buzzing type sounds when using the scroll wheel, unlike other mouse types I've used in the past. This mouse is a joy to use and am very happy with it and how it functions. Well worth the small investment I paid for it.Yes, I'd highly recommend this mouse for anyone, especially for late night computerists where the clicking and scroll wheel buzzing type sounds of other mice could annoy someone watching TV or sleeping, if the computer happens to be in your bedroom. The silence of this mouse is definitely golden!I'd double the Star rating on this one to 10-Stars if that were possible. Best mouse I've ever purchased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this quiet mouse!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at first to get the quiet mouse because I tend to like the click noise of the mouse (when I'm the one gaming lol) but the sound and feel of the click on this mouse is SO satisfying! I definitely won't be switching back to my normal loud mouse. It moves really smoothly and feels nice in my hand. The only downside is that I wish the scroll wheel was just the tiniest bit easier to scroll as I find myself accidentally clicking down on it just trying to scroll which then wildly scrolls the page. Not the biggest deal, maybe I'm just heavy-handed.The LED feature is really cool though I don't find myself ever using it. I have no clue what the button under the scroll wheel does, it doesn't seem to do anything but maybe it's just programmable.I didn't need anything super fancy so this is perfect, I'm really happy with my purchase.Edit: after using this mouse for a few weeks, I do have just one small complaint. On the bottom of the mouse is the power switch and there are three positions that it can be in: On with LED on, On without LED, and Off, in that order. My only complaint is that the On without LED option is in the middle. I rarely use the LED because I'm afraid it will drain the battery and I just don't need it, so it would be much more convenient if the On with LED was in the middle position instead so you could just switch it easily On/Off.I bring my mouse to work every day and the other day I accidentally switched it to On with LED instead of off and put it in my bag. When I got home a few hours later it was completely dead and I had to recharge it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Slim and Stylish Upgrade to My Workspace!
reviews.reviewText: The LED Wireless Mouse, G12 Slim Rechargeable, has breathed new life into my daily work routine. It's an absolute gem of a mouse, combining style and functionality seamlessly.First and foremost, the slim design is incredibly sleek and modern. It adds a touch of sophistication to my workspace while also being a pleasure to hold and use. The LED lighting adds a subtle, eye-catching element that elevates its aesthetic.The wireless functionality is a game-changer. The mouse connects effortlessly to my devices, and the absence of tangled cords has improved my workspace's overall tidiness. The rechargeable feature is another huge advantage; I no longer need to worry about constantly replacing batteries.The sensitivity and precision of this mouse are commendable. It glides smoothly on various surfaces and responds swiftly to my movements, enhancing my productivity. The adjustable DPI settings provide flexibility to match my preferences.The battery life is impressive. A single charge lasts for an extended period, even with heavy use. Plus, the mouse enters sleep mode when not in use to conserve energy, which is a thoughtful feature.The included USB receiver is conveniently stored in the mouse, making it easy to carry the mouse with me when I'm on the go. It's an added convenience that I greatly appreciate.In summary, the LED Wireless Mouse, G12 Slim Rechargeable, is a fantastic addition to any workspace. Its stylish design, wireless functionality, and long battery life make it a top-notch choice. If you're in search of a reliable and eye-catching mouse to enhance your work or play, this one is a winner! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Broke after falling once
reviews.reviewText: I really loved this, but it fell and broke & is now unusable. I have others that I use for work that has fallen multiple times and not broken, so quite disappointing this one broke after falling once. Other than that, it’s beautiful and the colors are great.

Je fais du traitement photo sur mon ordinateur et je cherchais une souris qui pouvais me donner des mouvements précis afin de déplacer lentement les curseurs de chaque paramètre photo du logiciel. A ma grande surprise j'ai enfin trouvé la souris parfaite pour ce travail. Fini les achats de batterie a répétition, la recharge dure plus d'une semaine pour le travail que je fais et j'apprécie énormément son ergonomie car je n'ai plus mal au poignet lors de son utilisation.
Llego sin problemas y a tiempo. Buen producto.
Es muy cómodo y preciso para juegos no lo he utilizado
Arrivato nei tempi e dall'aspetto stupendo, lo consiglio davvero
I love the look and feel of it. I love its colors, though its quite slow and not as bright as I thought it would be. The silent clicker is defintely very nice as well. Worth the price
